abstract: Creates an Imager image containing an equirectangular projection of the world map, with optional Maidenhead locator grid and day/night illumination showing the area of enhanced propagation known as the 'grey line'. Also utility methods for adding dots at locator positions or lat/long coords, and filling grid squares with colour to provide a 'heat map' of activity from these squares.
author: Matt Gumbley <devzendo@cpan.org>
name: Ham-WorldMap
